column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The hams hanging from the ceiling reminded me of my vivacious trip to Espana in 1995. Every single bar I went to there had jamons hanging from the ceilings. The difference here at BaBaRe
column2: was there was no cigaret smoke curing the hams
column3: as there was in Sevilla. Did they taste the same - I'll have to go back for that. They were the same variety
column5: with (ANIMAL RIGHTS ACTIVISTS STOP READING NOW) the hoof still attached
column6: and a little cone shaped drip cup stuck in to catch drips of savory ham juice.
